import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../assets/css/post.css' import {AiOutlineHeart,AiOutlineShareAlt,AiOutlineSave} from 'react-icons/ai' import {FaRegComment} from 'react-icons/fa' import {GrEmoji} from 'react-icons/gr' import {BsThreeDots} from 'react-icons/bs' function Post() { const [modal,setModal] = useState(false) const modalDot = () => { if(modal === false){ let showModal = document.querySelector('.dot-modal'); showModal.style.visibility = "visible" setModal(true) } } const closeOverlay = () => { if(modal === true){ let showModal = document.querySelector('.dot-modal'); showModal.style.visibility = "hidden" setModal(false) } } const addComment = document.getElementById('#addComment'); addComment.addEventListener('focus',() => { let shareComment = document.getElementsByClassName('.post-share'); shareComment.style.disabled = true }) return (
